articles.title: Thousands forced to flee as wildfires tear across Europe - 9News
articles.description: Strong winds and hot, dry weather frustrated French firefighters' efforts Saturday to contain a huge wildfire that raced across pine forests in the Bordeaux region for a fifth straight day.
